sentences.en: A wander around any market will reveal stalls piled high with vegetables.
sentences.cn: 随便到哪个市场逛逛，都能看见蔬菜堆得老高的菜摊。

sentences.en: Ana wandered off to get a drink.
sentences.cn: 安娜溜达着去弄了一杯喝的。

sentences.en: Because Mother is afraid we'll get lost, we aren't allowed to wander far.
sentences.cn: 妈妈生怕我们迷路，不准我们走远。

sentences.en: Don’t let any of the kids wander off.
sentences.cn: 不要让任何一个小孩走开去。

sentences.en: Don't let your mind wander [ be woolgathering ] while working.
sentences.cn: 工作时思想不能 开小差.

sentences.en: Don't let your mind wander during the lecture.
sentences.cn: 在上课时不要让自己的思想开小差.

sentences.en: Don't wander from the subject.
sentences.cn: 不要离题.

sentences.en: Grace allowed her mind to wander to other things.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝任由自己的思绪游走。

sentences.en: He likes to wander over the countryside.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢在乡间漫步.

sentences.en: He was constraining his mind not to wander from the task.
sentences.cn: 他克制着不让思想在工作时开小差.

sentences.en: He was found wandering the streets of New York.
sentences.cn: 有人看到他在纽约街头游荡。

sentences.en: He was not the type to wander round gaping at everything like a tourist.
sentences.cn: 他不是那种像个游客似的四处闲逛、对什么都好奇张望的人。

sentences.en: His mind would wander, and he would lose track of what he was doing.
sentences.cn: 他会走神，忘了自己正在干什么。

sentences.en: I jumped to my feet so my thoughts wouldn't start to wander.
sentences.cn: 我跳起来,免得走神.

sentences.en: Imagine long golden beaches where you can wander in solitude.
sentences.cn: 想象一下那长长的金色海滩吧，在那里你可以独自徜徉。

sentences.en: Nomadic tribes wander these deserts.
sentences.cn: 游牧部落在这些荒漠上游牧.

sentences.en: Pauline started to wander from the point.
sentences.cn: 保利娜开始偏题了。

sentences.en: People wandered the streets aimlessly.
sentences.cn: 人们在街上漫无目的地闲逛。

sentences.en: She wandered aimlessly about the house.
sentences.cn: 她漫无目的地在房子里走来走去。

sentences.en: She wandered aimlessly around the streets.
sentences.cn: 她在大街上漫无目的地到处游荡。

sentences.en: They could wander where they wished and take jobs from who paid best.
sentences.cn: 他们可以想去哪儿就去哪儿，谁给的钱多就给谁干活儿。

sentences.en: They wandered off in the direction of the nearest shop.
sentences.cn: 他们朝着最近那家店铺的方向闲逛去了。

sentences.en: When he got bored he wandered around the fair.
sentences.cn: 烦闷时，他便在集市上四处闲逛。

sentences.en: You can't simply wander around squatting on other people's property.
sentences.cn: 你不能这样到处乱窜，擅自占用别人的地产。

words.tran_cn: 流浪的；漫游的，徘徊的；蜿蜒的
流浪者；漫游者；迷路的动物

trans.tran_cn: 漫游，闲逛，迷路，走神，(目光)游离，蜿蜒
trans.tran_en: to walk away from where you are supposed to stay
to walk slowly across or around an area, usually without a clear direction or purpose
